## TextElement.textBufferObject property

 Pre-computed text vertex buffer. Used by point labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after label becomes visible for the first time.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
textBufferObject?: TextBufferObject;
```
